title: Consequences: spinal cord injury
creator_credit: University of Washington, Barry Corbet and Peter M Jamero
brief_description: Contrasts the excitement and exhilaration of adventure sports such as surfing, motorcycling, skiing, skateboarding and hang gliding, with the potential consequences of spinal cord injury and permanent paralysis. Emphasises learning your limitations, respecting them and recognising the risks.
